scripts.youtube-collector: node -e "const collector = require('./youtube-data-collector'); const c = new collector(); c.initialize().then(() => c.start())"
scripts.youtube-api: node -e "const api = require('./youtube-data-api'); const a = new api(); a.start()"
scripts.test-youtube-db: node -e "const db = require('./youtube-database'); const d = new db(); d.initialize().then(() => d.seedChannels()).then(() => d.close())"
